unicef-spe10.def: Palma index is defined as the ratio of the richest 10% of the population's share of gross national income divided by the poorest 40%'s share.
unicef-spe10.name: Palma Index of income inequality
unicef-spe10.source: World Income Inequality Database. Last update: May 2020.
unicef-spe10.dataset: World Income Inequality Database. Last update: May 2020.
